item.title: Building Babiri.net
item.description:
As of 2023, babiri.net has been rebranded to Statsugiri. To find out more, read here.

After 2 months and 132 commits, babiri V2’s API has been launched! babiri is comprised of an API for aggregated usage stats gathered from PokÃ©mon Showdown replays. I’m excited to share how babiri came to be and the technology powering the project. This post is inspired by Kevin’s zeal.gg write-up, which is a fantastic read on another competitive gaming tool.
